segments.text: not much . I'm just trying to hook up to the internet . I'm having a few problems though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've got all the cords plugged in , but it appears that I'm offline .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you using dial-up or broadband ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: actually , I've got a wireless connection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In that case , you need to turn on your airport .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hook up to the Internet every day . I can't believe I didn't do that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you like ever chat online ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but I'd like to . Do you have to pay to do instant messaging ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . You can register for free . Just go to the yahoo website and it will tell you how to do it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what do you do if people want to talk to you online but you don't want to talk to them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , you can always block them . When I don't feel like talking to certain people online , that's what I do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what's your email address ? I'll add you to my contacts list .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: cool . We can meet up in a chat room sometime or just chat online using messenger.thanks for your help .
